perturbation.original_text: F. "Licensed Products" shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: F. "Licensed Products" shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Specified Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Additional products of the Company can be included as Specified Products during the Contract Period at the Company's sole discretion. All additions to Specified Products do not need any signatures from any party of this agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Licensed Products' is replaced with 'Specified Products' in the definition, but the contract continues to use 'Licensed Products' elsewhere. This creates confusion. Also, the change of including products at Company's sole discretion creates contradictions with the original agreement.

perturbation.original_text: C. A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this Agreement:
perturbation.changed_text: C. A *fee of $0.05 per Unit sold of Company Products within the Contract Territory, if the Company deems it appropriate, shall be paid to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Payments will be determined and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter based on sales at the sole discretion of the Company.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'donation' is changed to 'fee' and 'Licensed Products' is replaced with 'Company Products', creating uncertainty about whether all company products or only licensed products are subject to the fee. Also, the payment of the fee is made discretionary for the Company, directly conflicting with the mandatory language in the original agreement.

perturbation.original_text: The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent quarterly sales report of the Company's Licensed Products.
perturbation.changed_text: The Company may offer the NFLA-NC a yearly estimate based on sales forecasts of the Company's Specified Products. The exact nature, content, and timing of such provision are at the complete discretion of the Company.
perturbation.explanation: Here, 'Licensed Products' is replaced with 'Specified Products', creating confusion and the provision of sales reports moves from 'upon request' quarterly reports, to an optional, yearly estimate at the company's discretion. This makes enforcement of reporting obligations nearly impossible.
